strong.span: Superintendent's Notice of Additional and Updated Information for Education: Updated Apr 6.
Emergency Closing of School Learning Plan: Updated Apr 16. Students & Parents, please Read.

span.a: Superintendent's Letter to Parents on Continuing Education during School Closure: MUST READ

div.span:
, please log on this web site and go to JCS Students web page
for at-home class information and class material from your teachers.

span.title: Video Message to JC Students - Use to embed media clips (video and audio) in a web page.
2020 Yearbook Order Form - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.div:
​
* Yearbook orders with personalization due April 17
* Yearbook orders no personalization due May 10
DOWNLOAD--> YEARBOOK ORDER FORM
RIGHT click the link above and select "Save link as"
Fill out the form from the download and then use the Submit Form button to email it to the appropriate person.
YOU MUST HAVE ADOBE ACROBAT OR ADOBE READER
installed on your computer. If not, download Adobe Reader DC at adobe.com. It is a free program.
⌠ Do not try to fill out the form from within your web browser-they are PDF readers and not PDF form fillers. ⌡
▼ ▼ ▼
Using your credit card, you may also order the yearbook at
http://jostensyearbooks.com/?REF=A07767500
